question_comments.body: Most likely the old Android Studio version uses an old built-in JDK version. And that old JDK misses certain trusted root CA certificates you require for downloading artifacts. Check which JDK is configured (if it is old most likely JDK 8) then download the latest JDK of the same major version, install it and configure it in Android Studio settings as JDK.to be used by Gradle.
Please provide informations about which JDK you are using
